trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission"></xref> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 可讓安全性動作<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission"></xref>来套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The action parameter is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: action 參數不是有效 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets full access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案或目錄的字串值所指定的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory for full access.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的完整存取權的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: The get method is not supported for this property.
trans-unit.target: Get 方法不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許的存取權的所有檔案。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取得或設定在本機電腦與網路磁碟機上的所有檔案的允許的存取。

trans-unit.source: An individual <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.
trans-unit.target: 個別<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>值可藉由使用位元`AND`作業。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess"></xref> values that represents the permissions for all files.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess"></xref>值，代表所有檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所有本機檔案的存取。

trans-unit.source: Local files are files contained on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 本機檔案是包含在本機電腦上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Any files that are not accessed through a network drive are local files.
trans-unit.target: 透過網路磁碟機不存取任何檔案是本機的檔案。

trans-unit.source: An individual <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.
trans-unit.target: 個別<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>值可藉由使用位元`AND`作業。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess"></xref> values that represents the permissions for all local files.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess"></xref>值，表示所有本機檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets append access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定附加檔案或字串值所指定的目錄存取權。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory for append access.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或附加存取權的目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案或目錄存取控制資訊可以在其中變更。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取得或設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Use additional <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute> attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 描述個人或群組已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: The ability to change an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.
trans-unit.target: 能夠變更 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄中存取可以變更控制資訊的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回新<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會由應用程式程式碼應該只能由安全性系統，呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換成中繼資料的序列化形式。

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 建立中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料，從 的權限，此方法會傳回對應至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission"></xref> that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission"> </xref>會對應至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The path information for a file or directory for which access is to be secured contains invalid characters or wildcard specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或維護安全存取的目錄的路徑資訊包含無效的字元或萬用字元規範。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file or directory to which to grant path discovery.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案或目錄，用來授與路徑探索。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets read access for the file or directory specified by the string value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案或目錄的字串值所指定的讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory for read access.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的讀取權限的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案或目錄存取控制資訊可以在其中檢視。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取得或設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Use additional <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute> attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 描述個人或群組已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: The ability to view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.
trans-unit.target: 能夠檢視 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄中的存取權可以檢視控制資訊的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file or directory in which file data can be viewed and modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案或目錄的檔案中的資料可以檢視和修改。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Append%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Read%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Write%2A> properties for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Append%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Read%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Write%2A>單一檔案或目錄的屬性。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Write%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Read%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Append%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use additional <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute> attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The access rights are for file data only; they do not include the access control properties <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ViewAccessControl%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ChangeAccessControl%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 對於; 僅限檔案資料的存取權限它們不包含存取控制內容<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ViewAccessControl%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ChangeAccessControl%2A>。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ChangeAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ViewAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `get` accessor is provided for C# compiler compatibility.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`get`提供存取子是 C# 編譯器相容性。

trans-unit.source: The C# compiler requires attribute properties to be read/write.
trans-unit.target: C# 編譯器要求是讀取/寫入屬性。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory in which file data can be viewed and modified.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的檔案中的資料可以檢視和修改的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""></xref> accessor is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""> </xref>會呼叫存取子。

trans-unit.source: The accessor is provided only for C# compiler compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 存取子僅供 C# 編譯器相容性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets write access for the file or directory specified by the string value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檔案或目錄的字串值所指定的寫入權限。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定單一檔案或目錄的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其他屬性來指定其他檔案和目錄。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory for write access.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的寫入權限的絕對路徑。
